info.title: Apache OpenMeetings API
info.description:
Integration API enables to connect to an OpenMeetings instance, eg for generating users, create links to directly access conference rooms.

It is mainly designed for Server2Server integration, for example to integrate into your website, CMS or 3rd party application

For examples how to use the Rest API see https://openmeetings.apache.org/RestAPISample.html.

Community contributed modules for using this API include for example:
  • Node.js module for using API
  • PHP composer module for using API
Other community plugins using this API for Moodle, SugarCRM, Drupal, Joomla can be found in the Configuration>Plugins section at https://openmeetings.apache.org

contact.name: Apache OpenMeetings Rest Examples and Documentation

tags.name: UserService
tags.description: The Service contains methods to login and create hash to directly enter conference rooms, recordings or the application in general

tags.name: RoomService
tags.description: RoomService contains methods to manipulate rooms and create invitation hash

tags.name: FileService
tags.description: Contains methods to import and upload files into the Files section of the conference room and the personal drive of any USER

tags.name: WbService
tags.description: WbService contains methods to manipulate whiteboard contents

tags.name: CalendarService
tags.description: CalendarService contains methods to create, edit delete calendar meetings

tags.name: GroupService
tags.description: The Service contains methods to login and create hash to directly enter conference rooms, recordings or the application in general

tags.name: NetTestService
tags.description: The Service contains methods to trigger a network test

tags.name: RecordingService
tags.description: The Service contains methods to work with recordings

tags.name: InfoService
tags.description: The Service contains methods to get info about the system

tags.name: ErrorService
tags.description: The Service contains methods to get localized errors

parameters.name: sid
parameters.description: The SID of the User. This SID must be marked as Loggedin

delete.description:
Delete a calendar event

 If the given sid is from an Administrator or Web-Service USER, the USER
 can delete any appointment.
 If the sid is assigned to a regular USER, he can only delete appointments
 where he is also the owner/creator of the appointment

parameters.name: sid
parameters.description: The SID of the User. This SID must be marked as Loggedin

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: the id to delete

500.description: Error in case of invalid credentials or server error

get.description:
Loads an Error-Object. If a Method returns a negative Result, its an
 Error-id, it needs a languageId to specify in which language you want to
 display/read the error-message. English has the Language-ID one, for
 different one see the list of languages

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: the error key for ex. `error.unknown`

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: The id of the language

500.description: Server error

 inside the room and all users that try to enter it will be redirected to
  the redirectURL that is defined in the ROOM-Object.

Method to remotely open rooms. If a room is closed all users
 inside the room and all users that try to enter it will be redirected to
  the redirectURL that is defined in the ROOM-Object.

parameters.description: The SID of the User. This SID must be marked as Loggedin

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: the room id

500.description: Error in case of invalid credentials or server error

get.description:
Returns an Object of Type RoomsList which contains a list of
 ROOM-Objects. Every ROOM-Object contains a Roomtype and all informations
  about that ROOM. The List of current-users in the room is Null if you get
   them via SOAP. The Roomtype can be 'conference', 'presentation' or 'interview'.

parameters.name: sid
parameters.description: The SID of the User. This SID must be marked as Loggedin

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of public rooms need to be retrieved

500.description: Error in case of invalid credentials or server error

get.description:
Checks if a room with this exteralId + externalType does exist,
 if yes it returns the room id if not, it will create the room and then
 return the room id of the newly created room

parameters.name: sid
parameters.description: The SID of the User. This SID must be marked as Loggedin

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: type of the room

parameters.name: externaltype
parameters.description: you can specify your system-name or type of room here, for example "moodle"

parameters.name: externalid
parameters.description: your external room id may set here

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: details of the room to be created if not found

200.description: id of the room or error code

500.description: Error in case of invalid credentials or server error

Adds a new User like through the Frontend, but also does activates the
 Account To do SSO see the methods to create a hash and use those ones!

parameters.description: The SID of the User. This SID must be marked as Loggedin

confirm.description: whatever or not to send email, leave empty for auto-send

500.description: Error in case of invalid credentials or server error

post.description:
Sets the SessionObject for a certain SID, after setting this
 Session-Object you can use the SID + a RoomId to enter any Room. ...
  Session-Hashs are deleted 15 minutes after the creation if not used.

parameters.name: sid
parameters.description: The SID of the User. This SID must be marked as Loggedin

500.description: Error in case of invalid credentials or server error
